# allowsRotation

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the physics body is affected by angular forces and impulses applied to it.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsRotation: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. This property is ignored on edge-based bodies, which are unaffected by forces in the system.

## Defining How Forces Affect a Physics Body

- **affectedByGravity**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this physics body is affected by the physics world’s gravity.
- **isDynamic**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the physics body is moved by the physics simulation.
